ovdesc.p: When the number of Previous history dates in PV.ASSET.DETAIL has reached more than 31, then the data for the last 16 dates are kept in the Live Record and the oldest previous fields will be moved PV.ASSET.DETAIL.HIST with a Sequence number. It is L type file
